basics.name: JIAN RUI CHENG
basics.label: PHP Programmer
basics.summary:
I'm a diplomatic/motivated programmer and graduated from National Formosa University(Information Management with B.S degree). In the past few years, I have kept concerning about programing skills to improve myself.

I also like to discuss web development technology with others so I established "Front-end study group".

In my job, I maintain existing projects,deal with complaints of customers and revision website in order to improving user experience on mobile devices.

Perhaps my experience is not enough but I always try to make the best and keep making progress

work.summary: Bulding e-commerce websites for KINJO Jewelry, and Greenvines with PHP prestashop framework, participating "Spark Protein" incubation at the same time
highlights: Promote Behavior-driven development (BDD), decrease communication cost
Import Socialite plugin, consolidating social login methods also reducing development time
Use GAS(Google Apps Script) connecting Google spreadsheet
Formulate back-end coding style, follow the PHP Standard Recommendation
Introduce repository mode, make model for common features
Adapt ajax return format for data-driven front-end development
Implement HTTP Request and Response standard

work.summary: CMS maintain and new features, web revision and dealing with customer complaints also setting up event website and creating crontab tasks
highlights: creating customize pixnet import crontab tasks

work.summary: POS System Maintenance and testing, receiving a Complaint and develop new feature for printing Financial statements
highlights: On site engineer at CANMENG AVEDA
Develop new feature for printing Financial statements

volunteer.summary: Study front-end as a beginner, most members were graphic designers. Assist self learning skills to finding answers by themselves instead of spoon-feeding and keep an eye on front-end technologies
highlights: Write basic tutorial documentation, shared by slides
Assist members in finding answers to questions

education.institution: National Taiwan University certificate of course completion
